title: 連結リスト4
question: ???に入るのはなに
source:
<color=#da70d6>#include</color> <color=#ce9178><stdio.h></color>
<color=#da70d6>#include</color> <color=#ce9178><stdlib.h></color>

<color=#c586c0>typedef</color> <color=#358cd6>struct</color> data DATA;
<color=#358cd6>struct</color> data<color=#ffd700>{</color>
  <color=#358cd6>int</color> number;
  <color=#358cd6>float</color> point;
  DATA* next;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>;

<color=#358cd6>void</color> init<color=#ffd700>(</color>DATA* p<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
  p->number = 0;
  p->po<color=#358cd6>int</color> = 0.0;
  p->next = <color=#358cd6>NULL</color>;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>

<color=#358cd6>void</color> Print<color=#ffd700>(</color>DATA* p<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
  printf<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ce9178>"Num:%d
"</color>,p->number<color=#ffd700>)</color>;
  printf<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ce9178>"Point:%f
"</color>,p->point<color=#ffd700>)</color>;
  fflush<color=#ffd700>(</color>stdout<color=#ffd700>)</color>;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>

<color=#358cd6>int</color> main<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ffd700>)</color>
<color=#ffd700>{</color>
  DATA* p;
  p = <color=#ffd700>(</color>DATA*<color=#ffd700>)</color>malloc<color=#ffd700>(</color>sizeof<color=#ffd700>(</color>DATA<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>)</color>;
  <color=#c586c0>if</color><color=#ffd700>(</color>p == <color=#358cd6>NULL</color><color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
    printf<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ce9178>"malloc failure
"</color><color=#ffd700>)</color>;
    <color=#c586c0>return</color> 1;
  <color=#ffd700>}</color>
  init<color=#ffd700>(</color>p<color=#ffd700>)</color>;
  *p = <color=#ff0000>???</color>;
  Print<color=#ffd700>(</color>p<color=#ffd700>)</color>;
  <color=#c586c0>return</color> 0;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>
